text: The Hill is the second studio album from gospel singer Travis Greene. RCA Inspiration, a division of RCA Records released the album on October 30, 2015. == Track listing == == Charts == {| class="wikitable" !Chart (2015) !Peak position |- |US Billboard 200 |align="center"|92 |- |US Top Gospel Albums (Billboard) |align="center"|1 |} ===Singles=== {| class="wikitable" !Year !Title !Chart !Peak position |- |2015 |"Intentional" |US Hot Gospel Songs (Billboard) |align="center"|1 |- |2016 |"Made a Way" |US Hot Gospel Songs (Billboard) |align="center"|1 |} ==External links== * Category:2015 albums
title: The Hill (Travis Greene album)
